biotools.summary: SoS Notebook is a Jupyter kernel that allows the use of multiple kernels in one Jupyter notebook. It also serves as the IDE for the SoS Workflow engine that allows the development and execution of workflows from Jupyter notebooks. SoS Notebook improving the readability and reproducibility of complex bioinformatic workflows by allowing them to be represented and executed from a Jupyter notebook interface.
